q: result: This red state wants more gun control-- indeed, they favor it more than national surveys have shown since the shooting of Sen. Bernie Sanders Gabrielle Giffords ( D) in the Tucson area. The poll asked: In general do you think Arizona should have stricter laws concerning who can buy guns or not? The answer was Yes 55%, No 38%.
